document_data.caption: A map showing the Firloch on Gwynneth.
document_data.name: Firloch
document_data.mainbody: The '''Firloch''' was a lake found on the island of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The lake was located near the center of the [[Winterglen]] just north of [[Citadel Umbra]] in northeast Gwynneth. The Firloch was longer than it was wide, covering approximately {{SI|24|sq mi|k|long=yes}}.
